p: RPE cells were infected with the viruses at a multiplicity of infection (moi) of 1. After 24 h GFP expression was measured in infected cells using a fluorescent microscope (Zeiss Observer Z1, Zaventem, Belgium). Viability of cells were measured using Cell Titer Glow assay (Promega, Madison, USA). The luminescence was read with a PHERAstar FS plate reader (BMG Labtech, Ortenberg, Germany).
